special_text:
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. If it’s a token, put an additional 
+1/+1 counter on it.
[-2]: Create your choice of a 1/1 green Plant creature token or a Food token, then create both.
[-3]: Creatures you control get +X/+X and gain trample until end of turn, where X is the number of noncreature tokens you control.
